description: Giving people the right to choose when to die could put the "vulnerable at risk", a campaigner says.
title: Legalising assisted dying could 'put vulnerable at risk'
title_page: Legalising assisted dying could 'put vulnerable at risk' - BBC News
maintext: After giving a presentation to Tynwald members on the issue, Dr Randall said changing the law could put "vulnerable people at risk of suffering real or imagined pressure from others to end their lives prematurely", adding that the terminally-ill patients have "the same legal protections as everyone else".
